content: अदक्षिण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] {@--1@} Not right, left. {@--2@} [न. ब.] Not bringing in Dakṣiṇā to the priests; without any gifts (as a sacrifice); मृतो यज्ञस्त्वदक्षिणः <ls>Pt. 2. 94.</ls> {@--3@} Simple, weakminded, silly; मेनेऽथ सत्यमेवेति परिहासमदक्षिणा <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} Not handy, skilful or clever; awkward. {@--5@} Unfavourable.
